body: Oread spellcasters sometimes find that their elemental heritage makes creatures of earth more willing to serve them. Summon monster and summon nature's ally spells that such oreads cast last 2 rounds longer than normal when used to summon creatures with the earth subtype. This racial trait replaces earth affinity.
name: Earth Insight
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Oreads/Alternate Racial Traits/Earth Insight
